mapper.select: select e.emp_id emp_id,e.emp_name emp_name,e.sex sex,e.address address ,d.dept_id "dept.dept_id",d.dept_name "dept.dept_name",d.location "dept.location" from Emp e LEFT JOIN dept d ON e.dept_id=d.dept_id ORDER BY e.emp_id
mapper.update: update emp set emp_name=#{emp_name},sex=#{sex} ,address=#{address},dept_id=#{dept.dept_id} where emp_id=#{emp_id}
